reference.ref: Hulse, J.D., Khoshgoftaar, T.M., Huang, H. (2007). The pairwise attribute noise detection algorithm. Knowledge and Information Systems 11 (2), pp. 171-190.

generalDescription.objective: To remove noisy instances from the training data.
generalDescription.howWork: It removes noisy instances from the training data by means of distance between values of attributes.

parameterSpec.param: function: type of agregation fuction: sum or max.
numExecutions: number of executions of the algorithm.
